column1: All repurchases were made using cash resources. Shares repurchased during fiscal year 2023 and the third quarter of
fiscal year 2022 were under the share repurchase program approved on September 14, 2021. Shares repurchased
during the second quarter of fiscal year 2022 were under the share repurchase programs approved on both September
14, 2021 and September 18, 2019. Shares repurchased during the first quarter of fiscal year 2022 were under the
share repurchase program approved on September 18, 2019. The above table excludes shares repurchased to settle
employee tax withholding related to the vesting of stock awards of $909 million and $2.7 billion for the three and nine
months ended March 31, 2023, respectively, and $1.0 billion and $3.7 billion for the three and nine months ended
